casebody.data:
Cody B. HEISINGER
v.
Ann H. DILLON et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided November 22, 2016 Ralph P. Dupont, in support of the petition. Linda L. Morkan and Christopher J. Hug, in opposition.

The plaintiffs petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 168 Conn.App. 467 , 147 A.3d 1123 (2016), is denied.

ROGERS, C.J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
